topics.body:
Squiggy, I need advice

So when I go to tv world, it takes up a segment of afternoon
Do I have to choose everyday between fighting monsters, or interact in the overworld, or is it possible to do both?

Also, is the only way to boost interaction stats through dialogue?
Are there wrong dialogue options?
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body: "Terrifying":http://arstechnica.co.uk/the-multiverse/2015/06/realdoll-is-working-on-ai-and-robotic-heads-for-its-next-gen-sex-dolls/
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5586e6616368724dce00194d#post_5586e6616368724dce00194d
I can't honestly answer that because peope have their on system when dealing with the Midnight Channel. Personally I dedicate all my efforts to rescuing the person as soon as possible and then use the days I have to spare to work on my social links. I have a feeling you can do both but I suck with scheduling. As for dialogue options I don't think there are any wrong choices or if there is I've never chose them. And you can boost interaction and your social links through other means. Whenever have the opportunity to make lunch, do it and invite someone to eat lunch with you. Some of your bros will call you on days off and ask if you want to hang out too.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body: Bananas
topics.author: 5007bbdf7f123b112f00023a

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5586e6616368724dce00194d#post_5586e6616368724dce00194d
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5586e7fa636872764c00088f#post_5586e7fa636872764c00088f

There are in fact wrong dialogue options. Most of the time its just manifests as not really helping you advance the social link and so you need to do more of the generic "spend time with X?" events that don't have any unique dialogue but do boost your s-links. However, there are a couple of choices that can outright break a s-link, but those are pretty obvious.

As for scheduling... I'd honestly recommend finding a guide on gamefaqs or something.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7
